## About Me

I am a recent PhD graduate in Computer Science from Stanford University, specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. My research focuses on developing novel deep learning algorithms for natural language processing. I am passionate about using AI to solve real-world problems and contribute to the advancement of knowledge.
